Author: FoofyFoof
Text: Obesity is his biggest problem by far.  A number of obese people have controlled it by not eating anything for months or even years.  Buy him a multivitamin and congratulate him on his weight loss and tell him to keep it up. By any means neccessary.

Author: Rivka90
Text: Maybe this is something that will bring you closer? Maybe don't try to give him advice or scare him out of it, but let him know you're here if he needs to talk..
